main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Pueblo, Colorado, where witnesses claimed to have seen round objects in the sky, moving rapidly.
interesting points: The sighting occurred over three nights between May 1 and May 3, 1956, Witnesses described objects varying in size from that of a baseball to a basketball, Objects were reported to have a white to grey color, They exhibited erratic movements and sometimes appeared to hover, Air Force investigations noted similar sightings on successive nights with reports from multiple individuals.
witness description: Civilians reporting from various locations in Pueblo, including guards at Pueblo Ordinance Depot and regular citizens.
